title: Side Effects of Journalism (with Errin Haines)
description:
This week, we connect with Errin Haines, journalist at The 19th (https://www.19thnews.org/), to assess where journalism as a medium exists in the current media landscape.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
